Sure! Here is an itinerary for a 4-day trip with the 20 most recommended places to visit with children near Bangkok, along with places to eat, shop, and relax.

Day 1:

1. Safari World Bangkok (Rank: 4.3) - This is an open zoo with a drive-through safari park, a marine park, and various shows with animals. Address: 99 Panyaintra Road, Samwatawantok, Klongsamwa, Bangkok 10510. Opening Hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Entry Ticket: Adult - 1,500 THB, Child - 1,200 THB.
2. KidZania Bangkok (Rank: 4.5) - An indoor edutainment center where children can role-play various professions in a mini-city. Address: 5th Floor, Siam Paragon, 991 Rama 1 Road, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Entry Ticket: Adult - 750 THB, Child - 1,100 THB.
3. Terminal 21 (Rank: 4.4) - A shopping mall with a unique concept of representing various cities around the world on different floors. Address: 88 Soi Sukhumvit 19, Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Bangkok 10110. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM.

Lunch: Baan Khanitha (Rank: 4.4) - A restaurant serving Thai cuisine in a traditional setting. Recommended dishes: Tom Yum Goong, Pad Thai, Massaman Curry. Address: 36/1 Sukhumvit Soi 23, Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Bangkok 10110. Opening Hours: 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM.

Dinner: Blue Elephant (Rank: 4.4) - A restaurant serving Royal Thai cuisine in an elegant atmosphere. Recommended dishes: Royal Thai Platter, Phad Thai Goong Sod, Gaeng Kiew Wan Gai. Address: 233 S Sathorn Rd, Khwaeng Yan Nawa, Sathon, Bangkok 10120. Opening Hours: 11:30 AM to 2:30 PM, 6:30 PM to 10:30 PM.

Foot Massage: Health Land Spa & Massage (Rank: 4.3) - A popular spa offering traditional Thai massage and other treatments. Address: 55 Ratchadapisek Rd, Khwaeng Din Daeng, Din Daeng, Bangkok 10400. Opening Hours: 9:00 AM to 12:00 AM.

Dessert: After You Dessert Cafe (Rank: 4.4) - A cafe chain famous for its Shibuya Honey Toast. Address: Multiple locations. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM.

Day 2:

1. Dream World (Rank: 4.2) - An amusement park with various rides and attractions. Address: 62 Moo 1, Rungsit-Ongkarak Road, Bueng Yitho, Thanyaburi, Pathum Thani 12130. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Entry Ticket: Adult - 1,100 THB, Child - 900 THB.
2. Siam Ocean World (Rank: 4.2) - An underwater world with various sea creatures and activities. Address: B1-B2 Floor, Siam Paragon, 991 Rama 1 Road, Pathumwan
